name: depth-icon-success
prompt: dimensional paper cut icon, blooming flower fully open with 5 petals, multiple stacked paper layers with visible depth, strong drop shadows, beveled torn edges, sage green #7FA889 petals with gold #F5D29A center, 3D paper sculpture effect, white background --v 7 --ar 1:1 --s 300

name: depth-icon-warning
prompt: dimensional paper cut icon, autumn leaf with curled edges, multiple stacked paper layers with visible depth, strong drop shadows, beveled torn edges, amber gold #D9B77F with orange undertones, 3D paper sculpture effect, white background --v 7 --ar 1:1 --s 300

name: depth-icon-error
prompt: dimensional paper cut icon, wilted drooping flower with bent stem, multiple stacked paper layers with visible depth, strong drop shadows, beveled torn edges, crimson #A23C40 petals with brown #564B3A stem, 3D paper sculpture effect, white background --v 7 --ar 1:1 --s 300

name: depth-icon-info
prompt: dimensional paper cut icon, unfurling fern spiral fiddlehead, multiple stacked paper layers with visible depth, strong drop shadows, beveled torn edges, sage green #6F8E72, 3D paper sculpture effect, white background --v 7 --ar 1:1 --s 300
